Darkfate::

"Don't worry about the base..." said the dragon "Your troops, 
Killfest and Drilbit's can use mine -if you desire."

And looking to Scorponok "If you wish to go, Scorponok, you can go... 
you have my permission... "

Ans looking to Killfest "What do you said, Killfest?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> "Let's face it, i'm expendible. Also, my cyber bee can do most of 
the dirty
> work" he replies almost smugly. Then he looked up at the huge robot 
and
> realized were he was. A strange planet, not like before, with new 
people.
> How ironic, he is now working against Megatron he thought. "Also, 
if you
> don't get a base, you'll be vulnerable, you're lucky the maximals 
havent
> taken advantage yet, Im the bot for the job"
